content.text: 1 1/2 cups Plain yogurt or sour cream
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 1/2 cups Plain yogurt or sour cream" )
( ing-8 "8 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves" )
( ing-9 "2 cups fine dry bread crumbs" )

content.text: 0) In a large bowl, combine first eight ingredients.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
   :inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@20:27 / AC
      :ppt ( "first eight ingredients"@28:51 / FOOD 
		:ref ing-0
		:ref ing-1
		:ref ing-2
		:ref ing-3
		:ref ing-4
		:ref ing-5
		:ref ing-6
		:ref ing-7
	)
      :loc ( tool-0-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	:_result eight-ing-mixture
   )
)

content.text: 1) Place chicken in mixture and turn to coat.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "chicken"@9:16 / FOOD )
		:gol ( eight-ing-mixture "mixture"@20:27 / FOOD )
		:_result ( chicken-mixture )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "turn"@32:36 / AC
		:ppt ( chicken-mixture / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-1-0 "to coat"@37:44 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:_result ( coated-chicken )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Cover and marinate overnight in the refrigerator.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Cover"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( coated-chicken / FOOD )
		:_result ( covered-chicken )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "marinate"@13:21 / AC
		:ppt ( covered-chicken / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "overnight"@22:31 / DUR )
		:loc ( too-2-0 "the refrigerator"@35:51 / TOOL )
		:_result ( marinated-chicken )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Remove chicken from marinade; coat each piece with crumbs.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
   :inform ( ac-3-0 "Remove"@3:9 / AC
      :ppt ( marinated-chicken "chicken"@10:17 / FOOD )
      :source ( "marinade"@23:31 / FOOD )
	:_result chicken-without-marinade
   )
   :inform ( ac-3-1 "coat"@33:37 / AC
      :gol ( chicken-without-marinade "each piece"@38:48 / FOOD )
      :ppt ( ing-9 "crumbs"@54:60 / FOOD )
	:_result chicken-with-crumbs
   )
)

content.text: 4) Arrange on a shallow baking pan.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
   :inform ( ac-4-0 "Arrange"@3:10 / AC
      :loc ( tool-4-0 "a shallow baking pan"@14:34 / TOOL )
      :ppt ( chicken-with-crumbs / FOOD )
	:_result chicken-on-pan
   )
)

content.text: 5) Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until juices run clear.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( temp-5-0 "350 degrees"@23:34 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "45 minutes"@39:49 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "juices run clear"@-1:-1 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( chicken-on-pan / FOOD )
		:_result ( FINAL_PRODUCT )
	)
)
